title: Rank potential difference in circuit open switch

content.description:
Refer to the following material to answer the group of questions.

The circuit shown above contains four identical lightbulbs with constant resistance, a capacitor C, which is initially uncharged, and a switch S. The switch is initially open.
content.question: Which of the following correctly ranks the potential differences ∆V1, ∆V2, ∆V3, and ∆V4 across the bulbs while the switch is open?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
